text.section: In this section, "candidate", "contribution", and "political committee" have the meanings stated in § 1-101 of the Election Law Article.
The restrictions in this section apply from the date of a member's appointment to the Board of Regents until the end of the member's tenure on the Board.

section.section:
This section does not prohibit a member of the Board of Regents from:
Making a personal political contribution;
Informing any entity of a position taken by a candidate or official; or
Engaging in other activities not specifically prohibited under paragraph (1) of this subsection.
A member of the Board of Regents may not be a candidate for a public office while serving on the Board.
